    • Constructor Detail

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.io.File f)
        Create a new configuration object
        Parameters:
        f - File to use as the configuration file (Please use Launch.getConfD()'s directory to keep all of your conf files)

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.io.InputStream f)
        Create a virtual read-only configuration object using an InputStream
        Parameters:
        f - An InputStream which contains configuration information.

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.net.URL f)
        Create a configuration object using a URL
        Parameters:
        f - The URL to look at for configuration information

        The value requested

      • getValueAsInt

        public int getValueAsInt(java.lang.String id)
        Attempts to convert the value assigned to 'id' to an int
        Parameters:
        id - The key used to identify the value required
        Returns:
        The value requested as an int

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.Object value)
        Sets a configuration value (Only works if the configuration was constructed with a File object, otherwise does nothing
        Parameters:
        id - Key used to identify this value
        value - Value to placed in the configuration
